adjectives.description: manageable (comparative more manageable, superlative most manageable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being managed or controlled.
examples: Synonyms: controllable, governable, (obsolete) maniable, tractable, subservient

entries.meaning: Capable of being done or fulfilled; achievable.
examples: Antonyms: unaccomplishable, unachievable, undoable, unfeasible, unfulfillable, unmanageable
